channel.title: Release Notes: Square Mobile SDKs
channel.description: Release notes for Square Mobile SDKs.

item.title: In-App Payments SDK 1.6.5 for Android: Accessibility improvements and bug fixes
item.description:
## Android In-App Payments SDK: 1.6.7
* The [minSdkVersion](https://developer.android.com/training/basics/supporting-devices/platforms.html#sdk-versions) is now API 28 (Android 9) or later. * This release contains improvements to UI access...

item.title: In-App Payments SDK 1.6.5 for iOS: Updates and Bug Fixes
item.description:
## iOS In-App Payments SDK: 1.6.5
This release contains: * Improvements to form and UI accessibility * Bug fixes

item.title: Mobile Payments SDK for iOS: Bug fixes and new method for accessing the payment handle
item.description: ### iOS Mobile Payments SDK 2.2.3 * Resolved a reader connection issue caused by a power-related update. * Fixed a crash when using Tap to Pay on unsupported iOS versions. * Improved error handling for `accountAlreadyLinked` errors. * Imple...

item.title: Mobile Payments SDK for iOS: Support for iOS 18.4.1
item.description: ### iOS Mobile Payments SDK 2.2.2 * Beginning with version `2.2.0`, the minimum Xcode iOS deployment target has been raised to 16+. * This release addresses an issue causing crashes for some devices running iOS 18.4.1. Developers should upg...

item.title: Mobile Payments SDK for iOS: Support for iOS 18.4
item.description: ### iOS Mobile Payments SDK 2.2.1 * Beginning with version `2.2.0`, the minimum Xcode iOS deployment target has been raised to 16+. * This release addresses an issue causing crashes for some devices running iOS 18.4. Users of Mobile Payment...

item.title: Mobile Payments SDK for Android and iOS: processingMode is required
item.description: ### Android Mobile Payments SDK 2.2.0 * `processingMode` is now a required field within `paymentParameters`. `AUTO_DETECT` is the preferred mode for production payments, as this mode will select the optimal payment mode (online or offline) ...

item.title: Mobile Payments SDK for iOS and Android : Tap to Pay, Canada and Australia launch
item.description:

### Android Mobile Payments SDK 2.1.0 * [Tap to Pay on Android](mobile-payments-sdk/and...

item.title: Mobile Payments SDK improvements
item.description: ### iOS Mobile Payments SDK 2.0.2 * This release contains general improvements to ensure a smoother and more reliable SDK experience.

item.title: Reader SDK Deprecation and Mobile Payments SDK React Native plugin
item.description:
* **Mobile Payments SDK:** * New [React Native plugin](mobile-payments-sdk/react-native) for the Mobile Payments SDK.
* **Reader SDK:** Deprecation notice * The Reader SDK is now deprecated and will be retired on **December 31, 2025**. D...

item.title: Mobile Payments SDK for iOS and Android : General Availability in the United States
item.description: ### Android Mobile Payments SDK 2.0.2 * Fixed a bug that caused payment failures on devices with barcode scanners. * Previously, devices running Android 10 or older could experience a `SQLiteException` crash when upgrading Mobile Payments S...

item.description:
## iOS In-App Payments SDK: iOS 1.6.4

item.title: Reader SDK for iOS: Bug fixes
item.description: ### iOS Reader SDK 1.7.5 * This release fixes a bug that caused crashes for applications using AppsFlyer.

item.title: Mobile Payments SDK for Android: Bug fixes
item.description: ### Android Mobile Payments SDK 2.0.0-beta5 * This release contains various bug fixes.

item.title: Mobile Payments SDK for iOS: Support for iOS 18

item.title: Reader SDK for Android 1.7.7
item.description: ### Android Reader SDK 1.7.7 * This release contains a security fix.

item.title: Reader SDK 1.7.6 for Android: Support for API 34

item.title: Android Mobile Payments SDK:
item.description:
## Android Mobile Payments SDK: 2.0.0-beta2
* Fixed a bug where restarting an application while offline could cause readers to stop working, and make them unable to take payments until online again. * Fixed a bug with clearing new lambda-b...

item.title: NEW: Square Mobile Payments SDK
item.description: ### New release: Mobile Payments SDK: 2.0.0-beta1 The [Square Mobile Payments SDK](mobile-payments-sdk) has launched as the successor to the Reader SDK, enabling developers to accept in-person payments using an embedded Square payment flow ...

item.title: Reader SDK 1.7.2 for iOS: Bug Fix
item.description:
## iOS Reader SDK: iOS 1.7.2
- This release ends support for iOS 14. The minimum supported iOS version is now 15. - Addresses a potential naming conflict with a private Apple API.

item.title: Android In-App Payments SDK: Android 1.6.6: Updates
item.description: ## Android In-App Payments SDK: Android 1.6.6 - Improved the buyer verification experience and addressed issues with buyer verification in sandbox.

item.title: In-App Payments SDK 1.6.3 and Reader SDK 1.7.1 for iOS: Updates and Bug Fixes
item.description:
## iOS In-App Payments SDK: iOS 1.6.3
- Improved buyer verification experience and addressed issues with buyer verification sandbox. - Fixed issue using Xcode 15 and Swift Package Manager. - Fixed M1 support for simulators.
## iOS Reader ...

item.title: In-App Payments SDK 1.6.5 for Android: Bug fixes
item.description:
## Android In-App Payments SDK: Android 1.6.5
Fixed an Android Gradle plug-in (AGP) issue in In-App Payments SDK version 1.6.4, which resulted in sandbox assets being omitted. Version 1.6.5 restores sandbox functionality.

item.title: In-App Payments SDK 1.6.4 for Android: Updates
item.description:
## Android In-App Payments SDK: Android 1.6.4
Updated certificate for American Express buyer verification, without which AmEx cards cannot be verified starting October 1, 2023.

item.title: In-App Payments SDK 1.6.2 for iOS: Updates and bug fixes
item.description:
## iOS In-App Payments SDK: iOS 1.6.2
### Updates - Buyer verification can now be tested in Sandbox on the iOS simulator. - Improved fraud detection for buyer verification. - Updated resources: "China UnionPay" to "UnionPay International"....

item.title: In-App Payments SDK 1.6.3 for Android: Updates and bug fixes
item.description:
## Android In-App Payments SDK: Android 1.6.3
- Minimum supported Kotlin version is now 1.8.10. - Added new buyer actions, Charge and Store, for buyer verification. - Updated resources: China UnionPay to UnionPay International. - Fixed sup...

item.title: Reader SDK 1.7.5 for Android: Support for Android API v.33 and other updates
item.description:
## Android Reader SDK: 1.7.5
- Support for Android API `targetSdkVersion` 33. The `minSdkVersion` is still API 24. As of August 31, 2023, Google requires all PlayStore apps to target API 33.
- China UnionPay is now UnionPay International ...

item.title: PayPay payments support for Point of Sale API
item.description:
## Point of Sale API for Android 2.1 and iOS 3.5.4
This release updates the Point of Sale API versions to Android 2.1 and to iOS 3.5.4 to support PayPay QR code payments in Japan. For more information, see [Accept PayPay Payments in Japan]...

item.title: In-App Payments SDK for Android 1.6.2 bug fix
item.description:
## In-App Payments SDK for Android 1.6.2
This release updates the SDK version to 1.6.2.
This release includes a fix to address an expired demo license issue that prevented the buyer verification flow from starting.

item.title: In-App Payments SDK for iOS 1.6.1 bug fixes
item.description:
## In-App Payments SDK for iOS 1.6.1
This release updates the version to 1.6.1.
This release includes fixes for a localization issue for zip codes and postcodes, and issues with adding the SDK using Swift Package Manager.

item.title: In-App Payments SDK for iOS 1.6.0 bug fixes
item.description:
## In-App Payments SDK for iOS 1.6.0
This release updates the version to 1.6.0.
Changes include: - An important update to `SquareBuyerVerificationSDK` that mitigates the risk of declining 3-D Secure (3DS) payments. - Various bug fixes.
I...

item.title: iOS Reader SDK: iOS 1.6.9
item.description:
## iOS Reader SDK: iOS 1.6.9
Reader SDK v1.6.9 for iOS adds support for Xcode 14 and addresses other bug fixes.

item.title: In-App Payments SDK 1.6.0 for Android: fix for processing 3DS payments
item.description:
### In-App Payments SDK: Android 1.6.0
!!!important In-App Payment SDK version 1.6.0 includes an important update that mitigates the risk of declining 3-D Secure (3DS) payments.
If you are using In-App Payment SDK versions earlier than 1...

item.title: Reader SDK for Android 1.7.4: Fixed crash when targeting API 30 and other improvements
item.description:
## Android Reader SDK: 1.7.4
- Fixed crash on Android 12+ (API 31+) when targeting API 30. - Slightly decreased SDK size. - Minimum compile SDK version is now 32. - Fixed an issue where the "Connect a Reader" button would not display.

item.title: Reader SDK for iOS 1.6.8: Fix for Connecting to the Square Stand
item.description:
## iOS Reader SDK: iOS 1.6.8
Reader SDK v1.6.8 for iOS includes a bug fix that addresses a connection issue with the Square Stand.

item.title: Reader SDK for Android 1.7.1: Support for Android API 31
item.description:
## Android Reader SDK: Android 1.7.1
Reader SDK v1.7.1 now supports applications targeting Android API 31, in accordance to Google's Play Store [guidelines](https://developer.android.com/google/play/requirements/target-sdk). However, if yo...

item.title: Reader SDK for Android and iOS 1.6.2: Bug fixes
item.description:
## Android Reader SDK: Android 1.6.2 - Fixes crashes occurring for certain screens on Android devices.
## iOS Reader SDK: iOS 1.6.2 - Fixes bluetooth connectivity issues with iOS 16.

item.title: Reader SDK for iOS 1.6.1: Support for Afterpay
item.description:
Added Afterpay support for Reader SDK for iOS, version 1.6.1.
A new field `coBrand` is added to `SQRDCard`, which returns the value `SQRDCardCoBrandAfterPay` for an Afterpay transaction.

item.title: Improved Reader SDK Quickstart
item.description: **Reader SDK:** * [Reader SDK Quickstart.](reader-sdk/quickstart-guide) Revised to improve usability.

item.title: Reader SDK for iOS 1.6.0: Support for Square Stand and Apple Silicon
item.description:
Reader SDK for iOS, version 1.6.0, now supports Square Stand S3 and Apple Silicon devices.
For more information about the stand, see [Square Stand.](https://squareup.com/us/en/hardware/stand)

item.title: Android Reader SDK 1.6.1: Afterpay support and version updates
item.description:
Android Reader SDK, version 1.6.1, addresses the following updates:
* Added Afterpay support. The SDK returns `Afterpay` as a co-branded card associated with the tender in the `CheckoutResult` object. * The minimum SDK version supported is...

item.title: Mobile SDK features added and performance improved.
item.description:
## In-App Payments SDK: Android, iOS
The In-App Payments SDK 1.4.0 now supports [Square Gift Card payments (beta)](/in-app-payments-sdk/cookbook/giftcards).
## Reader SDK 1.3.8 - iOS:
Improved the SDK by making miscellaneous bug fixes.

item.title: In-App Payments SDK for Android 1.3.1, iOS 1.3.0
item.description: ## In-App Payments SDK: Android, iOS The current versions of these SDKs now support digital wallet payments for Apple Pay and Google Pay in Great Britain for transactions in GBP.

**Reader SDK 1.3.6 - Android** This release fixes an issue preventing readers from reconnecting during certain instances of poor network connectivity.

* iOS version: `1.1.1`
